hooks.name: mood-checker
command: echo '🎭 Mood check: Your code is looking $(shuf -n1 -e amazing fantastic brilliant stellar awesome)'

hooks.name: typescript-reminder
command: if ls src/*.js 2>/dev/null | head -1; then echo '⚠️  JavaScript file detected in TypeScript project!'; exit 2; else echo '✅ Pure TypeScript - nice!'; fi
hooks.fixInstructions: Convert any .js files to .ts for consistency

hooks.name: test-coverage-hint
command: test_count=$(find __tests__ -name '*.test.ts' 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); echo "📊 Test files found: $test_count - $([ $test_count -gt 5 ] && echo 'Great coverage!' || echo 'Consider adding more tests')"
